languages.text: "И здесь правители мон-кай хранят отобранные у своего народа богатства? То, что я представляла себе хранилищем великих артефактов, оказалось... свалкой".

traits.locale_text: "И здесь правители мон-кай хранят отобранные у своего народа богатства? То, что я представляла себе хранилищем великих артефактов, оказалось... свалкой".

languages.text: "Is this where mon-keigh rulers keep the fortunes they take from their people? What I envisioned as a repository for great artefacts has turned out to be... a dumping ground."
languages.original_text: "И здесь правители мон-кай хранят отобранные у своего народа богатства? То, что я представляла себе хранилищем великих артефактов, оказалось... свалкой".

traits.locale_text: "Is this where mon-keigh rulers keep the fortunes they take from their people? What I envisioned as a repository for great artefacts has turned out to be... a dumping ground."
"Is this where mon-keigh rulers keep the fortunes they take from their people? What I envisioned as a repository for great artefacts has turned out to be... a dumping ground."
"Is this where mon-keigh rulers keep the fortunes they take from their people? What I envisioned as a repository for great artefacts has turned out to be... a dumping ground."
"Is this where mon-keigh rulers keep the fortunes they take from their people? What I envisioned as a repository for great artefacts has turned out to be... a dumping ground."
"Is this where mon-keigh rulers keep the fortunes they take from their people? What I envisioned as a repository for great artefacts has turned out to be... a dumping ground."
"Is this where mon-keigh rulers keep the fortunes they take from their people? What I envisioned as a repository for great artefacts has turned out to be... a dumping ground."

languages.text: 「ここが、モン＝ケイの支配者どもが民から巻き上げた富を保管する場所だというのか？偉大なる遺物の収蔵庫を想像していたというのに…実際は、ただの廃棄場だったとはな」
languages.original_text: "Is this where mon-keigh rulers keep the fortunes they take from their people? What I envisioned as a repository for great artefacts has turned out to be... a dumping ground."

traits.locale_text: 「ここが、モン＝ケイの支配者どもが民から巻き上げた富を保管する場所だというのか？偉大なる遺物の収蔵庫を想像していたというのに…実際は、ただの廃棄場だったとはな」

languages.text: "Bewahren die Chem-Pan-Sey-Herrscher hier die Reichtümer auf, die sie ihrem Volk stehlen? Was ich mir als Repositorium großer Artefakte vorgestellt hatte, entpuppt sich als ... Müllhalde."
languages.original_text: "Is this where mon-keigh rulers keep the fortunes they take from their people? What I envisioned as a repository for great artefacts has turned out to be... a dumping ground."

traits.locale_text: "Bewahren die Chem-Pan-Sey-Herrscher hier die Reichtümer auf, die sie ihrem Volk stehlen? Was ich mir als Repositorium großer Artefakte vorgestellt hatte, entpuppt sich als ... Müllhalde."

languages.text: « Est-ce ici que les dirigeants des mon-keigh entreposent les fortunes qu'ils prennent à leur peuple ? Je m'attendais à y trouver de précieux artefacts en quantité, mais ça... ce n'est qu'un dépotoir. »
languages.original_text: "Is this where mon-keigh rulers keep the fortunes they take from their people? What I envisioned as a repository for great artefacts has turned out to be... a dumping ground."

traits.locale_text: « Est-ce ici que les dirigeants des mon-keigh entreposent les fortunes qu'ils prennent à leur peuple ? Je m'attendais à y trouver de précieux artefacts en quantité, mais ça... ce n'est qu'un dépotoir. »

languages.text: «¿Es aquí donde los mon-keigh gobernantes amasan las fortunas que expolian a sus súbditos? Lo que imaginaba como un repositorio de artefactos grandiosos parece más bien... un vertedero».
languages.original_text: "Is this where mon-keigh rulers keep the fortunes they take from their people? What I envisioned as a repository for great artefacts has turned out to be... a dumping ground."

traits.locale_text: «¿Es aquí donde los mon-keigh gobernantes amasan las fortunas que expolian a sus súbditos? Lo que imaginaba como un repositorio de artefactos grandiosos parece más bien... un vertedero».

languages.text: “猴子的统治者从人民手里夺走的财富，原来就存放在这种地方吗？我本以为这里会是各种伟大造物的仓库，可实际上却是个……垃圾场。”
languages.original_text: "Is this where mon-keigh rulers keep the fortunes they take from their people? What I envisioned as a repository for great artefacts has turned out to be... a dumping ground."

traits.locale_text: “猴子的统治者从人民手里夺走的财富，原来就存放在这种地方吗？我本以为这里会是各种伟大造物的仓库，可实际上却是个……垃圾场。”

languages.text: "Mon-keigh hükümdarları, insanlardan çaldıkları hazineleri burada mı tutuyormuş yani? Muazzam eserlerle dolu bir servet beklerken çöplük çıktı karşımıza."
languages.original_text: "Is this where mon-keigh rulers keep the fortunes they take from their people? What I envisioned as a repository for great artefacts has turned out to be... a dumping ground."

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keigh hükümdarları, insanlardan çaldıkları hazineleri burada mı tutuyormuş yani? Muazzam eserlerle dolu bir servet beklerken çöplük çıktı karşımıza."

languages.original_text: "Is this where mon-keigh rulers keep the fortunes they take from their people? What I envisioned as a repository for great artefacts has turned out to be... a dumping ground."
